languages.text: "Давайте не будем ходить вокруг да около, госпожа Вистенца. В ваш адрес были выдвинуты более чем серьезные обвинения, которые Инквизиция намерена довести до вашего сведения. Ваши действия, прямо или косвенно, служат целям Архиврага".

traits.locale_text: "Давайте не будем ходить вокруг да около, госпожа Вистенца. В ваш адрес были выдвинуты более чем серьезные обвинения, которые Инквизиция намерена довести до вашего сведения. Ваши действия, прямо или косвенно, служат целям Архиврага".

languages.text: "Let's not beat around the bush, Governor Vyatt. Extremely serious allegations have been levelled against you, which the Inquisition wishes to bring to your attention. Your actions, whether directly or indirectly, serve the purposes of the Archenemy."
languages.original_text: "Давайте не будем ходить вокруг да около, госпожа Вистенца. В ваш адрес были выдвинуты более чем серьезные обвинения, которые Инквизиция намерена довести до вашего сведения. Ваши действия, прямо или косвенно, служат целям Архиврага".

traits.locale_text: "Let's not beat around the bush, Governor Vyatt. Extremely serious allegations have been leveled against you, which the Inquisition wishes to bring to your attention. Your actions, whether directly or indirectly, serve the purposes of the Archenemy."

"Let's not beat around the bush, Governor Vyatt. Extremely serious allegations have been leveled against you, which the Inquisition wishes to bring to your attention. Your actions, whether directly or indirectly, serve the purposes of the Archenemy."

"Let's not beat around the bush, Governor Vyatt. Extremely serious allegations have been leveled against you, which the Inquisition wishes to bring to your attention. Your actions, whether directly or indirectly, serve the purposes of the Archenemy."

"Let's not beat around the bush, Governor Vyatt. Extremely serious allegations have been levelled against you, which the Inquisition wishes to bring to your attention. Your actions, whether directly or indirectly, serve the purposes of the Archenemy."

languages.text: “咱们还是别兜圈子了，维亚特总督。有人对你提出了极其严重的指控，审判庭希望提醒你注意这一点。你的行为，无论是直接的还是间接的，都是在为混沌大敌的目标服务。”
languages.original_text: "Let's not beat around the bush, Governor Vyatt. Extremely serious allegations have been levelled against you, which the Inquisition wishes to bring to your attention. Your actions, whether directly or indirectly, serve the purposes of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: “咱们还是别兜圈子了，维亚特总督。有人对你提出了极其严重的指控，审判庭希望提醒你注意这一点。你的行为，无论是直接的还是间接的，都是在为混沌大敌的目标服务。”

languages.text: «No me andaré con rodeos, gobernadora Vyatt. Me constan acusaciones extremadamente graves en su contra y la Inquisición se ve obligada a intervenir. Sus acciones, sean directas o indirectas, están sirviendo a los fines del Archienemigo».
languages.original_text: "Let's not beat around the bush, Governor Vyatt. Extremely serious allegations have been levelled against you, which the Inquisition wishes to bring to your attention. Your actions, whether directly or indirectly, serve the purposes of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: «No me andaré con rodeos, gobernadora Vyatt. Me constan acusaciones extremadamente graves en su contra y la Inquisición se ve obligada a intervenir. Sus acciones, sean directas o indirectas, están sirviendo a los fines del Archienemigo».

languages.text: 「単刀直入に言いましょう、ビャット総督。あなたに対して極めて重大な申し立てが行われたことを、異端審問庁から通達します。総督の行いは、直接間接を問わず、渾沌の勢力を利するものである」
languages.original_text: "Let's not beat around the bush, Governor Vyatt. Extremely serious allegations have been levelled against you, which the Inquisition wishes to bring to your attention. Your actions, whether directly or indirectly, serve the purposes of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: 「単刀直入に言いましょう、ビャット総督。あなたに対して極めて重大な申し立てが行われたことを、異端審問庁から通達します。総督の行いは、直接間接を問わず、渾沌の勢力を利するものである」

languages.text: "Reden wir nicht um den heißen Brei herum, Gouverneurin Vyatt. Gegen Euch wurden extrem schwere Anschuldigungen erhoben, über die die Inquisition nun mit Euch sprechen möchte. Euer Handeln dient direkt oder indirekt den Zwecken des Erzfeinds."
languages.original_text: "Let's not beat around the bush, Governor Vyatt. Extremely serious allegations have been levelled against you, which the Inquisition wishes to bring to your attention. Your actions, whether directly or indirectly, serve the purposes of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: "Reden wir nicht um den heißen Brei herum, Gouverneurin Vyatt. Gegen Euch wurden extrem schwere Anschuldigungen erhoben, über die die Inquisition nun mit Euch sprechen möchte. Euer Handeln dient direkt oder indirekt den Zwecken der Erzfeindin."

languages.text: « Inutile de tourner autour du pot, gouverneure Vyatt. L'inquisition souhaite vous notifier des accusations extrêmement graves qui ont été portées contre vous. Vos actes, directement ou indirectement, ont servi les desseins du Grand Ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "Let's not beat around the bush, Governor Vyatt. Extremely serious allegations have been levelled against you, which the Inquisition wishes to bring to your attention. Your actions, whether directly or indirectly, serve the purposes of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de tourner autour du pot, gouverneure Vyatt. L'inquisition souhaite vous notifier des accusations extrêmement graves qui ont été portées contre vous. Vos actes, directement ou indirectement, ont servi les desseins du Grand Ennemi. »

languages.text: "Lafı dolandırmayalım Vali Vyatt. Engizisyon'un dikkatinize sunmak istediği, ziyadesiyle ciddi iddialar ortaya atıldı. Doğrudan veya dolaylı fark etmeksizin eylemleriniz, Şerbaşı'nın amaçlarına hizmet ediyor."
languages.original_text: "Let's not beat around the bush, Governor Vyatt. Extremely serious allegations have been levelled against you, which the Inquisition wishes to bring to your attention. Your actions, whether directly or indirectly, serve the purposes of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: "Lafı dolandırmayalım Vali Vyatt. Engizisyon'un dikkatinize sunmak istediği, ziyadesiyle ciddi iddialar ortaya atıldı. Doğrudan veya dolaylı fark etmeksizin eylemleriniz, Şerbaşı'nın amaçlarına hizmet ediyor."
